channel.title: What has your school done for homecoming?
channel.description:
Well, for any of the schools who HAVE had it already: What did your school do/what did you participate in? We are still in the homecoming week. Events we have had: (** Means I participated in them)
**-Tug O' War - Everyone knows what this is.
-Relay - People had to race against others to grab a scooter, roll down a huge hill by our school, and run across the football field in scuba diving flippers.
-Scooter Race - Name says all, different racing positions on scooters
**-Fear Factor - You were given questions that you had to answer. These questions ranged from sports teams to when the school was created. If you got the question WRONG, someone added a topping to a 2-scoop bowl of ice cream in front of you. These toppings were stuff like this:
[ul][li]Onions[/li] [li]Dill Relish[/li] [li]Cheetos[/li] [li]Snickers[/li] [li]Marshmallows[/li] [li]M&Ms[/li] [li]French Dressing[/li] [li]Ranch dressing[/li] [li]mushrooms[/li][/ul]
It was digusting, and with 4 other people, I puked. It was horrible, the texture just made you gag by itself. Everyone had to race at the end to finish their ice cream first. It was horrible/hilarious at the same time.
-Helping Hand - 2 people are blindfolded and hooked together, the person in back had to do tasks such as putting lipstick on the person in the front of them.
-Twister - Played like the normal game, but with relish on green, mustard on yellow, etc. A layer of dish soap was added on the top.
What have/has you/your school done for homecoming? If you haven't had homecoming yet, then post when you do have it.

item.title: What has your school done for homecoming?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

My school was lame. First was homecoming week, and it went: Neon, spirit, decade, character, Toga. Basically, each day we had to wear what the day was. But the assembly was amazing. I’m a senior, and the assembly theme was Cirque du Royale, so we had some professional circus performers com in. Two guys juggled knives over 4 guys laid out like a table, and then there was the contortionist and the acrobat. Let me just say this, two lesbians performing no handed moves between eachothers legs, and bending into amazing positions.

But that was about it.

Read full topic
item.source: What has your school done for homecoming?

item.title: What has your school done for homecoming?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Well seeing as I go to a private school, mine is probably different than yours.

Each day we dress for a theme(Sports, Spirit, Theme) ETC, decorate our halls(Each grade has different locker halls)

We have a football game for girls, skit night, pep rally, and of course the football game.

Read full topic
item.source: What has your school done for homecoming?
